RelatedSentence: The move was made in response to a request for assistance from governments in the region in support of ongoing flood relief efforts in Bosnia and Herzegovina , she said .
The U.S. flights came as floods left a trail of destruction in Bosnia , Serbia and Croatia , killing at least 47 people .
